titles.title: You are Full of Grace and Truth
Jalali Yesu

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
You are full of grace & truth (men) (ladies echo)
Jalali Yesu (men) (ladies echo)
(Jesus is glorious)- Urdu

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Jalali Yesu (Men)
Jalali Yesu (ladies)
Jalali Yesu (Men)
Jalali Yesu (ladies)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
You are great and You are good (men)(Ladies echo)
Jalali Yesu (men)(Ladies echo)

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
You are making all things new (men)(Ladies echo)
Jalali Yesu (men)
